name: Leo Feasby
what_you_do: The Masood Entrepreneurship Centre hosts the Venture Further Awards, showcasing university start-ups that are developing innovative solutions to real-world challenges across various industries.
who_you_serve: The awards target university entrepreneurs and start-ups, particularly those from The University of Manchester, looking to gain recognition and funding for their innovative business ideas.
bio: Celebrating the 25th Anniversary of the Masood Entrepreneurship Centre, recognized for fostering innovation and entrepreneurial excellence.
business_focus: The Masood Entrepreneurship Centre hosts the Venture Further Awards, showcasing university start-ups that are developing innovative solutions to real-world challenges across various industries.
